name: gitcoin-enterprise
description: This project is inspired by [gitcoin.co](https://gitcoin.co/).   [gitcoin.co](https://gitcoin.co) improves Open Source & Peer To Peer collaboration.

scripts.tslint: tslint -p client/ -c tslint.json && tslint -p server/ -c tslint.json
scripts.test: cd server && npm run setup && cd ../ && npm run lint && npm run ut && npm run at
scripts.lint: cd server && npm run lint && cd ../client && npm run lint
scripts.install: cd ./client && npm i && cd ../ && cd ./server && npm i && cd ../
scripts.build-prod: cd ./client && npm run build && cd ../ && cd ./server && npm run build && cd ../ && cp -a ./client/docs/ ./server/docs
scripts.dockers:delete: docker stop $(docker ps -a -q) && docker rm $(docker ps -a -q)
scripts.start: npm run build-prod && npm run dockers:delete && npm run docker:build && npm run docker:run
scripts.check-updates: ncu -u --configFilePath ./ && cd server && ncu -u --configFilePath ./server && cd ../client && ncu -u --configFilePath ./client

author: Michael Spengler
